name: First Person Piper
description:
This is a prototype for november's "One Game a Month" Jam. It's a first person shooter survival game using music. Each wolf can only be tamed by one of the flute sounds;  It took 1 week or so to be made and I actually don't know where to go from here. hahah I hope it inspires someone to create something fun!

Controls: WASD to move; Mouse left button to play and mouse wheel to change song; space bar to jump; E to interact (only on campfire);
